      • AI

        public AI(Game game,
          char maxPlayer)
        Constructor for AI class
        Parameters:
        game - The instance of TicTacToe the AI is to play in
        maxPlayer - The mark the AI is playing with (X/O)

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public Move makeMove()
        Method calculates the AI's next move.
        Returns:
        AI's calculated move

      • minmaxAB

        public Move minmaxAB(Board board,
                     MoveList potentialMoves,
                     int depth,
                     char player,
                     Move latestMove,
                     int alpha,
                     int beta)
        A minmax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning for calculating the next move.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board
        potentialMoves - List of moves to calculate scores for
        depth - Recursion depth
        player - Player whose turn it is
        latestMove - The most recent move on the board
        alpha - The current best score for the maximizing player
        beta - The current best score for the minimizing player
        Returns:
        Move calculated by the algorithm

      • addPotentialMoves

        public MoveList addPotentialMoves(MoveList moves,
                                  Move moveMade,
                                  Board board)
        Methods finds new potential moves based on/around the most recent move on the board.
        Parameters:
        moves - MoveList with existing potential moves
        moveMade - Most recent move
        board - Game's board
        Returns:
        List of new potential moves
